word: IN 1865 MRS. WHITE, THROUGH HOW TO LIVE, NO. 6, APPEALED TO OUR SISTERS TO ADOPT A STYLE OF DRESS WHICH WAS BOTH MODEST AND HEALTHFUL. THE NEXT YEAR THE NEWLY OPENED HEALTH REFORM INSTITUTE IN BATTLE CREEK TOOK STEPS TO DESIGN A PATTERN OF DRESS THAT WOULD CORRECT THE EXTREMES OF THE SHORT AMERICAN COSTUME OR THE ULTRA-LONG HEAVY DRESSES AS COMMONLY WORN.
